revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = 5big-thunderbolt-2.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = LaCie 5Big Network 2 |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://www.lacie.com/support/network-storage/5big-network-2/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = LaCie |model = 5Big |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Network 2 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L4005CMI-12G; |flash1size = 512 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS1G63EFR-S6C; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:D0:4B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;; |stockos = Linux;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA, eSATA |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 6 |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 8.33 |pwr_conn = DIN
|serial = yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V,, (115200 8N1),, J2, |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J9
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = fan, eSATA, metal case, |addchip = 4 Port SATA II Multiplier;Marvell;88SM4140;;2;,,, USB 2.0 HIgh Speed 2-Por Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2512A;;1;,,, PWM Fan Controller;GMT;G762;;1;,,, High Performance CPLD;Altera;EPM3064A;;1;,,, 4Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;STMicro;M24C04WP;;1;,,, 30V, 12.5A N-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP9408AGM;;2;,,, 3A, 28V, 1.4MHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2365DN;;2;,,, 30V, 8.8A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS4435;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/2010 |estprice = 375 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "LaCie SA 5BIG-NAS V2" and "Rev C" are silkscreened on the board.
===Specifications=== * Network Storage 5-bay :Processor: [[Marvell]] 88F6281 (Kirkwood) @1.2GHz :Memory: 256MB DDR3; Hard drives: 2x 3.5" (SATA) :LAN: [[Marvell]] 88E116E GbE (10/100/1000) :Ports: 2x GbE (RJ45), 2x USB 2.0, 2x eSATA
==Links of Interest== * [http://lacie-nas.org/doku.php?id=5big_network_2 ''Lacie 5big Network v2'' on '''LaCie-NAS Wiki''']
===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/31362-lacie-5-big-network-2-reviewed ''LaCie 5 Big Network 2 Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (December 2010) *[https://www.storagereview.com/review/lacie-5big-network-2-review ''LaCie 5big Network 2 Review'' on '''StorageReview'''] (September 2011) *[https://www.smallbusinesscomputing.com/testdrive/article.php/10728_3939446_2/Storage-Server-Review-LaCie-5big-Network-2.htm ''Storage Server Review: LaCie 5big Network 2'' on '''SmallBusinessComputing'''] (September 2011) *[https://lowendmac.com/2013/lacie-5big-network-2-network-storage-with-some-quirks/ ''LaCie 5big Network 2: Network Storage with Some Quirks'' on '''LowEndMac'''] (May 2013)
